parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS can cause the vehicle to lose braking ability, leading to extended stopping distances, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The anti-lock brake light turns on and off
the brakes malfunction when the light is off
the brake pedal goes to the floor
the vehicle does not slow down when applying the brakes
the rear brakes do not work
and the ABS activates unnecessarily
causing the front brakes to turn off.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the brake pedal can cause the vehicle to lose braking ability, leading to extended stopping distances, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal goes to the floor
the brakes do not respond when applying the brakes
and the vehicle does not slow down when applying the brakes.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Electrical Fires due to ABS Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS can cause electrical fires, which can lead to serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Fuses keep blowing out
resulting in electrical fires
and the dealer attributes the issue to a short in the wiring.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the torsion bar can cause the front passenger side of the vehicle to collapse, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential fatalities.
symptoms: The front of the vehicle falls down on the front passenger tire
accompanied by a noise
and the tire rubbing against the fender parts
making it difficult or impossible to turn the wheel or drive.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake system can cause severe pulling to the right, wheel vibration, and complete brake failure, leading to accidents and potential fatalities.
symptoms: Severe pulling to the right
wheel vibration
and complete brake failure
requiring frequent replacement of brake linings
and potentially causing rotors to rust and split.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Premature Wear of Tires and Suspension Components
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The premature wear of tires and suspension components can cause loss of control, accidents, and potential fatalities.
symptoms: Premature wear of tires
wheel vibration
and noise
accompanied by the need for frequent replacement of suspension components
such as idler arms
control arm bushings
and torsion bars.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Painted bumpers offer little to no protection in minor collisions, leading to increased consumer expenses for repairs not covered by auto insurance.
symptoms: Bumpers are easily damaged
paint chips or cracks
lights and grill are vulnerable to damage.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The roof blowing off while driving can cause serious injury or accidents, especially if occupants are ejected from the vehicle.
symptoms: Roof detaches or blows off while driving
sudden loss of structural integrity.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Door hinge failure can cause serious injury or accidents, especially if passengers are leaning against the door or exiting/entering the vehicle.
symptoms: Door hinge breaks
door drops down
stiff or difficult to open/close doors
potential metal fatigue.
